wikipedia_page.main: Scott Bradley Wharton (born 3 October 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Blackburn Rovers.

response: On 20 January Rovers announced Scott Wharton has joined Cambridge United on loan until the end of the season.
| 20 January 2017 || CB ||  || Scott Wharton || Cambridge United || End of Season ||
| 19 January 2017 || CB ||  || Scott Wharton || Blackburn Rovers || End of season ||
| 31 January 2018 || CB ||  || Scott Wharton || Blackburn Rovers || 30 June 2018 ||
On 11 September Rovers announced that defender Scott Wharton had signed a new 3-year contract.

On 31 January Rovers announced that the club has agreed to terminate the contract of young midfielder Connor Thomson by mutual consent, young center-back Scott Wharton has joined Lincoln City on loan until the end of the season, academy midfielder Callum Wright has joined Leicester City for an undisclosed fee.
| 31 January 2018 || DF ||  || Scott Wharton || Lincoln City || 6-month loan ||
On 18 July Rovers announced that defender Scott Wharton had signed a new 3-year contract, until 2021.
On 22 July Rovers announced defender Scott Wharton has re-joined Lincoln City on loan until the end of the season.
On 23 January Rovers announced that defender Scott Wharton has been recalled from his loan spell at Lincoln City & joined Bury on loan until the end of the season.
| 22 July 2018 || DF ||  || Scott Wharton || Lincoln City || Season Long (Recalled) ||
| 23 January 2019 || CB ||  || Scott Wharton || Bury || Season-Long ||
